test_message: Design the complete product architecture for VEMAR.AI including deepfake detection engine, behavioral biometrics, identity graphs, and API strategy from MVP to V2.

result.system_architecture: The system architecture for VEMAR.AI is built on a microservices framework to ensure scalability and flexibility. Key components include a Deepfake Detection Engine, Behavioral Biometrics Module, Identity Graph Database, a Challenge-Response System for user verification, and a Watermarking Service to authenticate content. Each of these components is designed to handle multi-modal inputs such as video, audio, image, and behavioral signals. The architecture supports real-time data processing and is divided into six main microservices: Ingestion, Processing, Storage, Verification, Watermarking, and API Gateway.

core_modules.name: Deepfake Detection Engine
core_modules.description: Utilizes AI algorithms to identify and flag deepfakes in multimedia content.

core_modules.name: Behavioral Biometrics Verification
core_modules.description: Analyzes user behavior patterns for identity verification purposes.
core_modules.tech_stack: AWS Lambda, Python, Behavioral Analytics Libraries

core_modules.name: Identity Graph Database
core_modules.description: Stores and retrieves identity-related information using graph database technology.

core_modules.name: Challenge-Response System
core_modules.description: Engages users with challenges to verify their identity in real-time.

core_modules.name: Watermarking Service
core_modules.description: Embeds invisible watermarks into content for authentication and tracking.

mvp_features: Basic Deepfake Detection for images and videos
Elementary Behavioral Analysis for user verification
Initial setup of Identity Graph database
Simple Watermark embedding in video files
v1_features: Real-time Deepfake Detection for live streams
Advanced Behavioral Biometrics with machine learning
Expanded Identity Graph database with API access
v2_features: Full coverage Deepfake Detection across all media types
Comprehensive Behavioral Analysis with predictive capabilities
Dynamic Identity Graph updates and linking related identities
Automated Challenge-Response calibration based on risk factors
Robust Watermark security with cryptographic verification
result.api_strategy: The API-first approach involves developing REST and GraphQL endpoints for each module. This ensures that users can seamlessly integrate VEMAR.AI's capabilities into their systems. APIs for detection, verification, and watermarking will support high-throughput and low-latency requirements. The API Gateway will handle authentication, request routing, and load balancing.
